channel.title: BetaScape [498] BH/Summoning MUCH MORE!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://betascape.info/forum/public/style_images/6_Logo2.png[/img]
[url=http://betascape.info]Forums[/url] [url=http://betascape.info/play/index.php]Play Now[/url]
Note: I'm currently looking for feedback on the server and some constructive criticism, don't expect many players on.
BetaScape is a 498 remake which has been in development for well over a year. What initially started as a project to remake runescape as the 498 revision, has now morphed into a classic rsps. The advantages of this outcome have left a rsps feel that players are familiar with and the added bonus of there being content EVERYWHERE.
Some key features for bs:
[ul][*]498 Deob [*]All F2P Areas have content coded [*]All world objects are interactable such as doors, ladders, staircases [*]Complete MySQL backend [*]Written from scratch, independent base [*]Majority of all npcs have proper dialogue and drops [*]All spells fully coded including lunars [*]Around 70% of all music tracks available [*]Can't be abused by cheat clients, can't even no-clip [*]All Cache data is on-demand[/ul]
Development Media
[img]http://gyazo.com/840f4adacd194ab1286414e914573a11.png[/img]

Come and join in the fun: [url=http://www.betascape.info]BetaScape[/url][/center]

[center]

Note: I’m currently looking for feedback on the server and some constructive criticism, don’t expect many players on.

BetaScape is a 498 remake which has been in development for well over a year. What initially started as a project to remake runescape as the 498 revision, has now morphed into a classic rsps. The advantages of this outcome have left a rsps feel that players are familiar with and the added bonus of there being content EVERYWHERE.

Some key features for bs:

[ul][]498 Deob
[]All F2P Areas have content coded
[]All world objects are interactable such as doors, ladders, staircases
[]Complete MySQL backend
[]Written from scratch, independent base
[]Majority of all npcs have proper dialogue and drops
[]All spells fully coded including lunars
[]Around 70% of all music tracks available
[]Can’t be abused by cheat clients, can’t even no-clip
[]All Cache data is on-demand[/ul]
